images.name: shadowsocks
images.description:
Shadowsocks used to set up a Sock vpn and proxy.
 Usage: docker run --name ${local_name} -e PASSWORD=${password} -e METHOD=$method -p${port}:8388 -p${port}:8388/udp -d shadowsocks/shadowsocks-libev

images.name: ffmpeg
images.description: Using the command: "docker run --rm -v `pwd`:/tmp/workdir jrottenberg/ffmpeg $*" for the multimedia files convertion
